mapper.select: SELECT mvn_aply.stud_no, ALTMNT_RM_CD, STUDENT.user_nm , stts_clsf,STUDENT.gndr_nm FROM mvn_aply JOIN STUDENT ON mvn_aply.stud_no = STUDENT.stud_no WHERE STUDENT.user_nm = #{user_nm};
select rm.rm_cd , rm.actc_nope , rm.altmnt_nope from mvn_rm as rm join rm_info on rm.rm_cd = rm_info.rm_cd where rm_info.bldg_cd = #{bldg_cd};
mapper.update: update MVN_RM set ALTMNT_NOPE = ALTMNT_NOPE + 1 where rm_cd = #{altmnt_rm_cd};
update MVN_APLY set ALTMNT_RM_CD = #{altmnt_rm_cd} ,STTS_CLSF = 4,ALTMNT_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'), MVN_YMD = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') where STUD_NO = #{stud_no};
mapper.select: select gndr_nm from student where stud_no = #{stud_no};
